entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 6:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -25

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
